short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces random NYT article headlines with Jenny Holzer's truisms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jenny Holzer's Truisms integrate blunt and pointed statements in mundane, everyday environments. This Chrome extension emulates this in the online world by randomly replacing NYT homepage headlines with Holzer's truisms. :)
